transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Yaar Shahnawaz baat kar raha tha sir aapka account manager.
Customer: Haan haan haan ji.
Executive: Sir actually aapko message aaya hoga haan haan abhi ek number se 74 se starting hai aur uske last mein 625 hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Us number se hamare toll free number pe call aaya tha aur unhone bola ki ye number update karwana hai to kya kuch problems vagera aa rahi hai sir kya ho gaya actually kya hua tha log out ho gaya tha to wo jo primary number tha na to wo pata nahi chal raha tha kiska primary number hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To iske chakkar mein haan to wo kar rahe the abhi ho gaya ho gaya clear ho gaya OTP 625 wale aapke hi matlab ka number hai na office ka hi number hai.
Customer: Haan haan hamare office hamare office ka hi hai sir.
Executive: Okay okay ye different number se call aaya tha to main bhi worry ho gaya tha sir ki ye different number se kaise call sar vagera.
Customer: 625 wala number hai na.
Executive: Haan haan 625 hai.
Customer: Haan haan theek hai office ka hi number hai.
Executive: Office ka hi hai aise abhi services vagera aapki kaun handle kar raha hai sir aap handle kar rahe hain.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi main main nahi kar raha hun Munish karta hai na to wo un sab ke mind setup mein ye tha ki mere paas hai aur mera primary number hat gaya wo Munish ka dal diya tha humne to uske vajah se dikat aa rahi hai.
Executive: To ek bar aap Munish sir se jab bhi aapki discussions hogi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To ek bar kyuki maine ek do bar call kiya unse discussions vagera bhi meri hui hai pichle mahine but services vagera maine sir sir bata rahe the ki vagera mein dikat aa rahi thi kuch.
Customer: Saturday Saturday phone kar liya karo sir abhi ho sake to.
Executive: Saturday mein kya hota hai na sab available rehte hain main bhi utha lunga wo bhi utha lenge.
Executive: Okay okay wahi services ke regarding kyuki buyleads vagera sir jo main business hota hai aapko pata hi hoga India mart se down ho gaya.
Customer: Haan haan bilkul bilkul sir.
Executive: Bilkul hi abhi sir main bata raha hun ki aapko teen char mahine se bilkul hi koi kam nahi kar rahe hain.
Customer: Koi kam nahi kar rahe hain.
Executive: Bahut hi kam use ho raha hai sir uske liye abhi specially ha banda humne baithaya hai usi ke liye aaj login kara rahe the.
Customer: Achcha achcha haan haan.
Customer: To main isko koi nahi dikat hai sir aap main Saturday ko aise ek bar call kar lunga aur aapne jo bande ko baithaya unko sahi se use karna vagera guide kar diya ya uski bhi requirement padegi.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi jarurat padegi to call kar lenge main aapka number de dunga.
Executive: Haan mera number save kar lijiyega sir maine jo whatsapp pe aapko drop kiya hai na wo number save kar lijiyega agar in future aapko koi bhi dikat vagera ya koi bhi problem aaye India mart se related to aap mere ko hi directly call kar lijiyega sir kyuki wo toll free number pe jata hai to waha se confusion ho jata hai mere ko number show nahi hota sir ki kaun se client ka number aa raha hai sir abhi bhi wahi hua tha maine confirmations ke liye call kiya tha ki ye teesre number se kaise call aa raha hai do number hi registered hai yahan.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir baat ki koi bhi dikat hoti hai to aap mere ko batayega sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's number was not updated.

- Buyleads are very low for 3-4 months.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the number is from the office.

- Executive asked to call on Saturdays.

- Executive shared his direct number for future issues.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, update, contact
